title: Baltair
description: The ring she found is giving her too much courage for a modern woman in 1706 to have.Ellie was captured during her last time travel adventure. But her friend's husband's life hangs in the balance, so she'l soldier on to his rescue.Baltair is glad to see Ellie again. Her friend married his cousin and stayed, while Ellie went back to their time. But he keeps his distance. Many will die in the upcoming battle, maybe including him.There are 14 other books in the series! author: Jane Stain
